overview:
Always Innovating is GrÃ©goire Gentil’s fifth startup in fourteen years. Grgoire most recently launched (and continues to oversee) Zonbu, the first environmentally-responsible computer designed for consumers. Earlier, he founded Twingo, which was acquired by Cisco Systems in 2004.

Gregoire has broad technical expertise in designing and developing complex software solutions. He earned a Master’s degree in Civil Engineering from Ecole des Ponts et Chausses, a Master’s in Math and Physics from Ecole Polytechnique in France and a Master of Science from Stanford School of Engineering. He is also an alumni from McKinsey&Company.
